title: Cabba
skills_text:
You can't include non-《Universe 6》 Battle Cards in your deck, except for 〈Vegeta〉 cards.
When a blue or yellow 《Universe 6》 card is played in your Battle Area, that card gets +5000 power for the duration of the turn, then choose up to 1 card in your life and add it to your hand.
When your life is at 4 or less : You may choose up to 2 of your energy, switch them to Active Mode, and flip this card over.
skills_back_text:
This card gets +5000 power when all of your opponent's energy is in Rest Mode.
When this card attacks, draw 1 card.
When your opponent's Leader Card attacks, if all of your opponent's energy is in Rest Mode, choose up to 2 of your opponent's energy. Cards chosen with this card's skill can't be switched to Active Mode during your opponent's next Charge Phase.
When one of your card skills switches an opponent's Battle Card or energy to Rest Mode, draw 1 card.

title: Vegeta, Saiyan of Universe 7
energy_text: 4()
skills_text: When you play this card, choose up to 2 of your opponent's Battle Cards with energy costs of 3 or less and return them to their owners' hands, then draw that many cards.

title: Champa, Scheming God of Destruction
skills_text: When you play this card, choose up to 1 blue or yellow 《Universe 6》 card in your Battle Area other than this card, and it gets +10000 power and for the duration of the turn.

title: Sisterly Bonds Kale
skills_text: When you play this card from your hand and your Leader Card is a 《Universe 6》 card, look at up to 10 cards from the top of your deck and choose up to 1 blue or yellow 〈Cabba〉 or 〈Caulifla〉 card among them with an energy cost of 2 or less and play it, then shuffle your deck.

title: Hit, Ace of Universe 6
skills_text: 《Universe 6》 : (This skill takes effect when you have 2 or more of the specified Battle Cards in play.) When you play this card, reduce the combo cost of blue and yellow 《Universe 6》 cards in your hand by 1 for the duration of the turn.

title: Cabba, Saiyan of Universe 6
skills_text:
When you play this card, look at up to 7 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 2 blue or yellow 《Universe 6》 cards among them and add them to your hand, then shuffle your deck. If you added a card to your hand, choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area.
When you play this card, if {Planet Sadala} is in your Battle Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's Battle Cards in Rest Mode. Cards chosen with this card's skill can't be switched to Active Mode until the end of your opponent's next turn.

title: Caulifla, Troublemaker of Universe 6
skills_text: When you play this card, you may choose 1 card in your life and add it to your hand. If you do, choose up to 1 of your opponent's energy and switch it to Rest Mode.

title: Vegeta & Cabba, Master-Pupil Bond
energy_text: 3()
skills_text:
(If it's your opponent's turn, you can activate this during the Defense Step by placing cards in your hand in your Drop Area that match all colors specified by : Choose up to 2 of your energy and switch them to Active Mode.)
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
When this card activates , you may choose 1 card from your hand and place it in your Drop Area. If you do, choose up to 1 blue or yellow 《Universe 6》 card in your Drop Area with an energy cost of 2 or less and no keyword skills, and play that card.

title: Planet Sadala
energy_text: 2()
skills_text:
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
When this card is placed in your Battle Area, choose up to 1 《Universe 6》 card from your hand with an energy cost of 2 or less and play it. If you played a card, draw 1 card.
When this card is placed in a Drop Area from a Battle Area, choose up to 1 of your opponent's energy, switch it to Rest Mode, then look at up to 5 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Universe 6》 card with an energy cost of 5 or less among them, add it to your hand, and shuffle your deck.

title: Frost's Deadly Poison
energy_text: 3()
skills_text:
(If this card is placed in an Energy Area from any area, it must be placed there in Rest Mode.)
The Battle Card your opponent is playing is played in Rest Mode with its skills negated for the duration of the turn, then draw 1 card. Then, if your life is at 3 or less, choose up to 1 of your blue or yellow energy and switch it to Active Mode.
